definition: marked by a lack of interest, enthusiasm, or concern for something : apathetic
marked by no special liking for or dislike of something
examples: indifferent about which task he was given

definition: being neither good nor bad : mediocre
being neither excessive nor inadequate : moderate
that does not matter one way or the other
of no importance or value one way or the other
characterized by lack of active quality : neutral

examples: indifferent tissues of the human body

definition: capable of development in more than one direction, not yet embryologically determined
